name: Barbariccia's Spirit
effects: Increase magic damage against Beasts by 50%
Increase magic damage against Avians by 50%
Increase magic damage against Humans by 50%
Increase magic damage against Stones by 50%

name: Barbariccia's Spirit
巴爾巴莉希亞之魂
발바리시아의 영혼
Esprit de Barbariccia
Barbarizias Seele
Espíritu de Barbariccia
desc_short: Boost HP by 30% and boost magic damage against human, beast, avian and stone monsters
提高30%HP+魔法攻擊時提高對人形系、野獸系、鳥系、岩石系魔物的傷害
HP 30% 상승+인간형, 야수형, 조류형, 암석형 마물에 대한 마법피해량 상승
Augmente les PV de 30% et augmente les dégâts magiques contre les humains, les bêtes, les oiseaux et les statues
Erhöht LP um 30% und mag. Schaden gegen Menschen, Bestien, Vögel und Steinmonster.
Aumenta VIT un 30% y aumenta el daño mágico contra humanos, bestias, aves y pétreos
desc_long: Boosts HP by 30% and boosts magic damage inflicted to human, beast, avian and stone monsters.
提高30%HP+魔法攻擊時提高對人形系、野獸系、鳥系、岩石系魔物的傷害。
HP가 30% 상승하고 인간형, 야수형, 조류형, 암석형 마물에 대한 마법피해량이 상승합니다.
Augmente les PV de 30% et augmente les dégâts magiques contre les humains, les bêtes, les oiseaux et les statues.
Erhöht LP um 30% und mag. Schaden gegen Menschen, Bestien, Vögel und Steinmonster.
Aumenta la VIT un 30% y aumenta el daño mágico contra humanos, bestias, aves y pétreos.
